profiledesc.creation: Cette notice a été encodée en XML conformément à la DTD EAD (version 2002).

did.unitdate: 1854. No internal date. Not dated by Vinson (1868) nor by Cabaton (1912). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854).

physdesc.physfacet: Scribal hands: (U1) Ariel's title scribe. Tamil script: regular puḷḷi, long ō/ē (double-curled kompu). Incised, soot. (U2) Tamil script. Incised, soot. (U3) Tamil script. Incised, soot. (U4) Tamil script. Incised, soot.

coverFront: the front cover. U1: 1 folio = Title Page (additional). No foliation. Verso blank. f1v more dark = original outside page. 3 unblackened lines on f1v. Indien5a: 38 folios. U2: 1 folio = Diagram. No foliation. Verso blank. U3: 1 folio = Stanza (?). No foliation. Verso blank. Indien5b: 9 folios. Indien5c: 10 folios. U4: 1 folio = guard leaf. No foliation. Verso blank. coverBack: the back cover.

corpname.normal: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

repository.corpname: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

scopecontent.p:
The palm-leaf bundle, a composite manuscript, entitled Viratam Mūṉṟu on its additional title page, contains:
The Manōṉmaṉiyantāti (Indien 5a).
The Vināyakaruṭaiya Mūlātārattiṉuṭaiya Uyir (Indien 5b).
Mantras and cakkarams (Indien 5c).

The bundle also contains:
A title page folio (U1).
A diagram (U2).
A stanza (U3).
A back guard leaf (U4).
U2 and U3 are found between Indien 5a and Indien 5b and might be part of either.
Description based on the digital images available on Gallica.
Dimensions after Cabaton (1912).
Contents (Composite manuscript)
(U1) Title Page (additional)
(U2) Diagram
(U3) Stanza (?)
(U4) guard leaf

list.item: shelfmark, cover, front: BnF shelfmark sticker: “INDIEN 5” (front cover, recto).
user-related note, front: BnF bequest sticker “DON N° [vacat]” (front cover, recto).
(U4) title: Added in black ink: “kaḷḷāṭavurai” (f[1]v). This has no relation with the content of the manuscript.

scopecontent.p:
Transcription conventions
() indicates unclear text. {} indicates a note. [vacat] indicates the scribe deliberately left a space. […] indicates an ellipsis. General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

did.unitdate: 1854. No internal date. Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854).

physdesc.physfacet: Scribal hands: (U1, U2) Tamil script. Incised, soot.
U1: 1 folio = ManōṉmaṉiyantātiInvocation. No foliation. U2: 37 folios = Manōṉmaṉiyantāti: Text. Tamil foliation {1}, 2-37.

scopecontent.p: The Manōṉmaṉiyantāti.
Contents (Single-text manuscript)

(U1) Manōṉmaṉiyantāti: Invocation
Incipit
ceyyāta tīviṉaikaḷ ceytāluñ ceyta
[2] kuṇam ~ […]
Explicit
[…] y-uṉṉ aṭiyai pukaḻum āṟē {piḷḷaiyār cuḻi (long)}

(U2) Manōṉmaṉiyantāti: Mūlam
Incipit
poṉṉ itaḻ pānta malar koṉṟai […]
Explicit
[…] paramparam vaṉṉiyaṭi poṉṉiṉ muṭiyē {piḷḷaiyār cuḻi (long)} {nūṟu} {piḷḷaiyār cuḻi (long)}

list.item: (U1, T1) blessing (formulaic): civamaya {inscribed inside oṁ symbol with a triśūla}

(U2, T2) header: [left margin ]
[1-4] varākiyammaṉuṭaiya pātamē tuṇai

scopecontent.p:
Transcription conventions
() indicates unclear text. {} indicates a note. [vacat] indicates the scribe deliberately left a space. […] indicates an ellipsis. General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

bibliography.bibref: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 2, no. 5
Rosny, Léon de (1868). “La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry”. In: Variétés orientales (pp. 177‒224). Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. (1866-). Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 1r, no. 5.

Vinson, Julien (1868). Manuscrits tamouls. Proofreadings of the catalogue for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)”. — See p. 1, no. 5. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49).

custodhist.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acqinfo.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

did.unitdate: 1854. No internal date. Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854).

physdesc.physfacet: Scribal hands: (U2) Tamil script. Incised, soot.
U1: 1 folio = guard leaf. Blank recto verso. U2: 8 folios = Vināyakaruṭaiya Mūlātārattiṉuṭaiya Uyir . Tamil foliation {1}, 2-8.

scopecontent.p: A work named Vināyakaruṭaiya Mūlātārattiṉuṭaiya Uyir.
Contents (Single-text manuscript)

(U2) Vināyakaruṭaiya Mūlātārattiṉuṭaiya Uyir
Incipit
Oṃ ṟīṃ śṟīṃ Aṃ civakaṇapati tēvar
[2] Oṃ Aṃ Uṃ […]
Explicit
[…]
[2] tāṉākaṇapati caraṇam caraṇam {piḷḷaiyār cuḻi (long)} {piḷḷaiyār cuḻi (long)}

list.item:
(U1, T1) header: [left margin ]
[1-4] vināyakar-uṭaiya mūlātārattiṉ-uṭaiya Uyir {piḷḷaiyār cuḻi (long)}
(U1, T1) title: vināyakar-uṭaiya mūlātārattiṉ-uṭaiya Uyir {piḷḷaiyār cuḻi (long)}

(U1, T1) blessing (formulaic): kuru pātamē
[4] tuṇai {piḷḷaiyār cuḻi (long)}

did.unitdate: 1854. No internal date. Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854).

physdesc.physfacet: Scribal hands: (U1, U2) Tamil script. Incised. (U3, U4, U5, U6, U7, U8) Tamil script. Incised, soot.

U1: 1 folio = Vayiravar Mantiram . No foliation. U2: 1 folio = TBC. No foliation. U3: 1 folio = Vayiravaṉ Mantiram . No foliation. U4: 1 folio = Vālai-Paramēsvari-Mantiram . No foliation. U5: 1 folio = Cuppiramaṇiyar Mantiram . No foliation. U6: 2 folios = Pēcci-Mantiram . No foliation. U7: 2 folios = Taṉṉai Kaṭṭu Mantiram . Tamil foliation 1-2. U8: 1 folio = TBC. No foliation.

scopecontent.p: Mantras accompanied with cakkarams. This appears to be a composite manuscript, described here as multi-text manuscript for the sake of convenience.
Contents (Composite manuscript)

(U1) Vayiravar Mantiram
Incipit
Ōṃ ṟīṃ śṟīṃ […]
(U2) TBC

(U3) Vayiravaṉ Mantiram
Incipit
Ōm yiṟiṅ ruṅ […]

(U4) Vālai-Paramēsvari-Mantiram
Incipit
Ōm Ayyum vālai paramēsvari […]

(U5) Cuppiramaṇiyar Mantiram
Incipit
Ōm Ām […]
Explicit
[…] {piḷḷaiyār cuḻi (short)}

(U6) Pēcci-Mantiram
Incipit
Ōm […]

(U7) Taṉṉai Kaṭṭu Mantiram
Incipit
Om· […]
Explicit
[…] {piḷḷaiyār cuḻi (short)}

(U8) TBC
Incipit
Om· Am […]

list.item:
(U3, T3) header: [left margin ]
[1-2] tirucciṟṟampalam
[3-4] vayiravaṉ mantiram

(U7, T7) header: [left margin ]
[1-3] taṉṉai kaṭṭu mantiram
